frontmatter.author: Žan Mervič
frontmatter.title: Orange Fairness - Reweighing a Dataset
frontmatter.shortExcerpt: Introducing the Reweighing widget in Orange, a solution for dataset bias mitigation.
frontmatter.longExcerpt: Building on our exploration of the Orange fairness addon, this blog delves into the Reweighing widget. By adjusting weights for dataset instances, the widget addresses bias, focusing on underrepresented groups. Using the Compas dataset as an example, we demonstrate how bias decreases post-reweighting, presenting visual insights into the distribution of adjusted weights and their impact on dataset fairness.
